ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon walked off into the field, BrightBlade was nowhere to be seen, and she never said so, but Gangon knew when he was not wanted. Gangon thought about when

Content-Type: text/plain;

Gangon walked off into the field, BrightBlade was nowhere to be seen, and s=
he never said so, but Gangon knew when he was not wanted. Gangon thought ab=
out when BrightBlade first got her new job, and the fact that now she didn'=
t need him anymore, and it made him heart sick. Gangon walked off into the =
field, a tear running down his face. Lightmare galloped by. Lightmare came =
back around and screeched to a halt in front of Gangon, transforming to her=
 robot mode.

"Hello, sugar! What are ya up to?" Lightmare said, kissing Ga=
ngon, Gangon didn't even notice as he thought of the good times he had toge=
ther with BrightBlade.

"Nothing really, BrightBlade dumped me, I guess, ho=
w about you?" Gangon asked.

"I don't got much to say neither, except I ass=
isted in killing a bot, well anyway, I knew that that BrightBlade was no go=
od, the moment I saw her I knew that you were too good for her!" Lightmare =
said. All in one movement, Gangon grabbed Lightmare and pinned her against =
the tree.

"Never talk about BrightBlade like that! She is better than you =
and you need to keep your mouth shut before someone shuts it for you!" Gang=
on said, slowly releasing Lightmare. Lightmare stared open mouthed wide eye=
s and Lightmare slowly walked alongside Gangon, feeling very rejected...
